name: Describe and draw triangles and quadrilaterals 2

skills.name: Use the properties of a square to find missing lengths
Identify a rectangle from a description of the properties
Given the name of a parallelogram, draw or identify a corresponding diagram
Given the name of a trapezium, draw or identify a corresponding diagram
Given the name of an isosceles triangle, draw or identify a corresponding diagram

explanations.A: This a quadrilateral with opposite lengths that are equal and parallel, called a parallelogram.
explanations.B: A trapezium is a quadrilateral with only 1 pair of parallel sides, as marked by the arrows.
explanations.C: This is a quadrilateral with 4 sides of the same length, called a rhombus.
explanations.D: This is a kite, a quadrilateral that has 2 pairs of equal sides, but are not opposite or parallel.
